text: "Song Sung Blue" is a 1972 song by Neil Diamond. It was taken from his eighth studio album Moods. It went to number 1 in the United States and New Zealand, number 14 in the United Kingdom, number 5 in South Africa, Belgium and Australia, number 2 in Canada and number 17 in Ireland. title: Song Sung Blue
